Second portfolio website - The one you are using right now.

This is my second website I have fully developed and finished, this one being way bigger than my first one. After I created my first website I knew I need to keep practising and create something bigger and better. To improve my work I started to use Git as I am working from Linux based OS. Another improvement you can see that this website uses some jQuery animations, JavaScript and small PHP script for my contact form.

I kept my gulp.js workflow from the previous project and I personally love the way it works and features it can add. I also tried Initializr and learnt quite a lot of optimising SEO of websites, Google analytics and page load optimisation technics such as expires headers, caching and entity tags. In the beginning of this project I studied Inkscape and website designing to create wireframe of this website and I also used coggle.it to write down ideas and sitemap of this project.
